H0.text: In Japan, the term Mikado is an alternative name for what . Shogun

H1.text: In Japan, the term Mikado is an alternative name for what . Samurai

H2.text: In Japan, the term Mikado is an alternative name for what . Daimyo

H3.text: In Japan, the term Mikado is an alternative name for what . EMPEROR

A4.text: In English, the term mikado (御門 or 帝), literally meaning 'the honorable gate', was once used (as in The Mikado, a 19th-century operetta), but this term is now obsolete.
